title.rendered: “IDF Intercepts Rockets from Lebanon: No Casualties Reported in Lower Galilee”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Following the alerts that were activated in the north of the country a short while ago, approximately 20 launches crossing from Lebanese territory into the Lower Galilee area were identified, some of which were successfully intercepted by air defense forces.

Additionally, following the alert activated at 5:34 regarding missile and rocket fire in the Ramot Naftali area, the air defense forces successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target identified in the area. There were no casualties and no damage occurred.

The alert regarding rocket and missile fire was activated due to concerns about falling interception debris.

Attached is documentation of the interception of the target in the Ramot Naftali area: https://bit.ly/4eMx3SV
